trans-unit.resname: PROE·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Name
PROE·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from spells that are one or more colors, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from spells that are one or more colors, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

trans-unit.resname: PROE·112★ | Guul Draz Assassin | Card Name
PROE·112★ | Guul Draz Assassin | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/2 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. LEVEL 4+ 4/4 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/2 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. LEVEL 4+ 4/4 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PROE·156★ | Lord of Shatterskull Pass | Card Name
PROE·156★ | Lord of Shatterskull Pass | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-5 6/6 LEVEL 6+ 6/6 Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.
trans-unit.target: Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-5 6/6 LEVEL 6+ 6/6 Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

trans-unit.source: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

trans-unit.source: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."
trans-unit.target: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."
